btn.name: ✏️ Name
html.revoke: 🚯 Revoke access Choose a user below to revoke their access to {{assistant}}.
cb.name: 🤖 New name
html.asst.new.name: 🤖 Enter a new name for the assistant. Current name: {{name}}
html.asst.new.inst:
☝️ Enter the instructions for your assistant. Current instructions: 
{{instructions}}
html.asst.new.greeting:
💬 Enter the greeting message for your assistant. (Max. 512 characters) 💁 Note: You can use these two placeholders to be replaced with corresponding values automatically during chat. These values will be unique per user, and will be automatically updated if the assistant's name is changed: {{user}} 👉 User's first name {{char}} 👉 Assistant name Current greeting message: 
{{greeting}}
html.asst.new.name.toolong: ❌ The name entered is too long. Enter a name no longer than 64 characters.
html.asst.new.inst.toolong: ❌ The instructions are too long. Enter a text no longer than 3072 characters.
html.asst.new.greeting.toolong: ❌ The greeting message is too long. Enter a greeting message of max. 512 characters.
html.import:
⬇️ Import an assistant from online character libraries ⚠️ Only chub.ai characters are supported for now. 🔗 Enter a valid character URL to import. Example: 
https://chub.ai/characters/characterizerfin/adrielle-12131f79
html.import.url.invalid: ❌ This isn't a URL. Please enter a valid character URL from a supported online library.
cb.guest.missing: 🚫 Assistant doesn't seem to exist anymore.
cb.guest.exists: 🚫 You already have {{assistant}} in your library.
cb.revoke.user: 🚯 {{user}} no longer has access to this assistant.
cb.revoke.all: 🚯 {{assistant}} is no longer shared with anyone.
inline.html.guest:
Here, try out this new assistant I created! 🤖 Name: {{assistant}} ☝️ Instructions: 
{{instructions}}
